XXmaricdhu:1: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma /
XXmaricdhu:4: tatra khalu bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
XXmaricdhu:5: asti bhikṣavo mārīcī nāma devatā sā sūryacandramāsoḥ purato 'nūpagacchati /
XXmaricdhu:6: sā na dṛśyate na gṛhyate na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na muṣyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate na dahyate na śatror anūpagacchati /
XXmaricdhu:7: yo 'pi tasya bhikṣavo mārīcīnāmadevatāyā nāma jānāti so 'pi na dṛśyate na gṛhyate na badhyate na nirudhyate na
XXmaricdhu:8: virudhyate na muṣyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate na dahyate na śatror anūpagacchati
XXmaricdhu:10: aham api @ayam api@@ na dṛśyate na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na
XXmaricdhu:11: muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate na dahyate na śatror anūpagacchati /
XXmaricdhu:13: tadyathā ḥ oṃ padākramasi parākramasi udayamasi nairamasi arkamasi markamasi urmasi vanamasi gulmamasi cīvaramasi mahācīvaramasi antardhānamasi svāhā /
XXmaricdhu:38: tadyathā ḥ namo ratnatrayāya oṃ ālo tālo kālo sacchalo satvamudrati rakṣa rakṣa māṃ saparivārasya sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ svāhā /
XXmaricdhu:42: tadyathā ḥ oṃ vattālī vadālī varālī varāhamukhī /
XXmaricdhu:44: bandha mukhaṃ jambhaya stambhaya mohaya svāhā /
XXmaricdhu:46: oṃ varālī vadālī vattālī varāhamukhī sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭānāṃ cakṣurmukhaṃ bandha bandha jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya mohaya mohaya bhañjaya bhañjaya tarjaya tarjaya hrīṃ hrīṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
XXmaricdhu:47: oṃ mārīcyai sara sara muhya muhya vimuhya vimuhya apakrāmya apakrāmya sarvaduṣṭasatvān pathe utpathe sarvavidhnavināyakā apasarantu mā tiṣṭhantu triratnasatyena svāhā /
XXmaricdhu:49: oṃ agali pagali pañcagali sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭānāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ mukhaṃ cakṣuṣi bandha bandha hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ* phaṭ* phaṭ*
XXmaricdhu:51: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
